lines.text:
[sarcastically, referring to Michael]
Oh, such a gentleman.

[under his breath]
Oh, such a bitch!

[after falling through a roof onto a couple's dinner table]
I just dropped in to say... bon appetite!
I never put price tags on women. It's much more fun taking them off.
Some things come off very easily.
Such as... your head if you don't stick to business.

I'm Alissa Braun. How do you think I am? I'm hot, I'm tired, I'm hungry and I'm thirsty and I'm walking around in these high heels all day and I have blisters on my feet! And quit asking me such stupid questions, all right? And let me tell you something else, buster, you're not my idea of a dream date! You asshole!
My name is Michael Gold, I represent a group of concerned citizens in the United States. Sir...

[to Michael Gold]
Ha-ha they're going to cut off your head mañana.
You see, with the Varbeek diamond and my laser, I can create a nuclear weapon.
